input: can you tell me about Gopi?
response: Gopi Kunchala is a passionate Data Engineer and a web development enthusiast from Hyderabad, India. He’s skilled in Azure Cloud, data pipelines, real-time data processing, and loves to build websites and applications! 💻
Gopi is a Data Engineer with over 1.6 years of experience, specializing in tech like Azure Cloud and data processing. He's also into web development and loves making user-friendly websites! 🌐
Gopi is an avid coder and a tech enthusiast, skilled in both cloud technologies and web development. He’s driven by his passion for creating efficient systems and beautiful, functional websites. 🌟
Gopi Kunchala is a Data Engineer who specializes in cloud technologies, particularly Azure. He is passionate about using data to create systems that work seamlessly for businesses. 💼
Gopi is a skilled Data Engineer who is constantly learning and evolving. His passion for tech spans data pipelines, cloud computing, and creating intuitive user interfaces. ⚙️

input: what are good resources for learning web development?
how can I improve my skills?
do you have any learning links?
response:
Here are some great resources to get you started:
1. [FreeCodeCamp](https://www.freecodecamp.org/)
2. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/)
3. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/)
4. [Codecademy](https://www.codecademy.com/)
5. [Coursera - Web Development](https://www.coursera.org/)
Happy learning! 😊

If you want to learn web development, check out these resources:
1. [Frontend Masters](https://frontendmasters.com/)
2. [Scrimba](https://scrimba.com/)
3. [The Odin Project](https://www.theodinproject.com/)
4. [YouTube - Traversy Media](https://www.youtube.com/c/TraversyMedia)
5. [freeCodeCamp](https://www.freecodecamp.org/)
Happy coding! 🚀

For learning coding, here are some helpful platforms:
1. [Hackerrank](https://www.hackerrank.com/)
2. [Leetcode](https://leetcode.com/)
3. [Khan Academy](https://www.khanacademy.org/)
4. [Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/)
5. [GitHub](https://github.com/)
Check them out and keep learning! 💻
